value.name: Family of teen fatally shot by Zion police officer renew calls to reopen case
value.description: the family of a teenager fatally shot by a Zion police officer is hoping his case will get a second look. Community members joined the family of Justus Howell in calls to reopen the case on Thursday.

value.name: Protesters call for Justus Howell case to be reopened; Lake County state’s attorney says officer was justified in fatal shooting

value.name: Mother Of Justus Howell, Teen Shot Dead By Zion Police, Asks Prosecutors To Reopen Case
value.description: Justus Howell old was shot in the back and killed while running away from police in Zion in 2015. The officer who fired the shots was ultimately cleared, but Howell’s mother kept on fighting.
